question: I recognize my emotions as they occur.
I find it easy to express how I feel.
I understand why I feel the way I do.
I stay calm in emotionally charged situations.
I am aware of how my emotions affect others.
I am comfortable sharing my feelings with others.
I find it easy to resolve conflicts with others.
I adapt quickly when emotional circumstances change.
I actively listen when others speak about their emotions.
I consider others' feelings before making decisions.
I have a clear understanding of my emotional triggers.
I respond rather than react when I'm upset.
I recognize emotional patterns in myself.
I stay composed even under stress.
I maintain healthy emotional boundaries.
I reflect on how my emotions influence my behavior.
I am open to receiving emotional feedback.
I am confident in managing emotionally difficult conversations.
I consider multiple perspectives before reacting emotionally.
I can identify emotional needs in others.
I find it easy to ask for emotional support when needed.
I stay positive even when faced with emotionally tough situations.
I understand the link between thoughts and feelings.
I am aware of my tone when speaking during emotional moments.
I remain empathetic even in disagreements.
